titles.title: Expressing support for the designation of May 4, 2025, as a "National Day of Reason" and recognizing the central importance of reason in the betterment of humanity.
Expressing support for the designation of May 4, 2025, as a "National Day of Reason" and recognizing the central importance of reason in the betterment of humanity.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary: This resolution supports the designation of a National Day of Reason and encourages everyone in the United States to uplift the central importance of reason, critical thought, the scientific method, and free inquiry to resolving social problems and promoting human welfare.
